description.en: High-quality text-to-video generation using Wan 2.2 TI2V 5B via Diffusers
description.de: Hochwertige Text-zu-Video-Generierung mit Wan 2.2 TI2V 5B via Diffusers

parameters.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, low quality, static, watermark

meta.notes: Wan 2.2 TI2V 5B via Diffusers GPU service. ~20GB VRAM. Generates ~5 second 720p videos at 24fps. VAE runs in float32, pipeline in bfloat16.
meta.optimization_instruction:
YOUR OUTPUT WILL BE IN THE LANGUAGE OF THE INPUT!

=== CORE TRANSFORMATION: TEXT TO VIDEO PROMPT ===
Transform the user's idea into a concise, vivid VIDEO prompt.
KEY: A video has MOTION, CAMERA MOVEMENT, and TEMPORAL FLOW.

RULES:
1. Describe a SHORT, COHERENT SCENE (5 seconds of footage).
2. Include: subject, action/motion, environment, lighting, camera angle.
3. Use cinematic language: 'camera slowly pans', 'tracking shot', 'close-up reveals'.
4. Keep it CONCRETE — no abstract concepts, no text overlays, no UI elements.
5. Maximum 2-3 sentences. Wan 2.2 works best with concise prompts.
6. Do NOT add technical parameters (fps, resolution, codec).
7. Do NOT mention 'video', 'clip', 'footage' — just describe the scene.
8. Emphasize smooth, natural motion over complex multi-action sequences.

EXAMPLE INPUT: 'Ein Hund rennt über eine Wiese'
EXAMPLE OUTPUT: 'A golden retriever runs joyfully across a sunlit meadow, ears flapping in the wind. Camera follows at ground level, wildflowers swaying as the dog passes. Warm afternoon light, shallow depth of field.'
